meanings.definition: The branch of technology that deals with the design, construction, operation, and application of robots.
meanings.sent1: Robotics involves creating machines that can perform tasks autonomously.
meanings.sent2: Many universities offer courses in robotics to teach students about designing robots.
meanings.sent3: The robotics competition was intense, with each team showcasing their unique robot designs.
meanings.sent4: In the world of robotics, innovation is key to developing advanced robotic systems.
meanings.sent5: The future of robotics looks promising with the continuous advancements in technology.

meanings.definition: The use of robots in industry.
meanings.sent1: The automotive industry relies on robotics for efficient assembly line production.
meanings.sent2: Companies invest in robotics to streamline manufacturing processes and increase productivity.
meanings.sent3: During the factory tour, the visitors were amazed by the precision of robotics in action.
meanings.sent4: Robotics has revolutionized the manufacturing sector by enhancing speed and accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The integration of robotics in industries has led to significant cost savings over time.
